full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SNOD MIN RNAMS LA BSTAN PA DANG LTAS SAR GYUR NA GTONG DMAR MA DANG YUL LHA GNYAN PO ` BLA MA RNAL 'BYOR BZHUGS SO, ,BTZAN RGOD 'BAR BA'I SHUGS LDAN GNYIS KYIS DE'I SNYING KHRAG 'THUNG SHIGS MA YA: RNAL 'BYOR BA NGED RANG GIS BKAB GROL BA NI MA GTOGS SO, ,RGYA RGYA RGYA:
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (ZHES NGER RANG LA BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR 'DI NI SLOB MA 'JAM DBYANGS @006A *, ,SHES RAB KYI RGYUN GYI KHA 'DON DU GYI NA BA, ^PADMA 'OD ZER GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,ZAB LAM BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR 'DI, GZHAN LAS GSANG TE NYAMS SU LEN, ,'CHAL BAR MA SPYOD SNYING LTAR GCES, ,GDONG DMAR LHA MOS BYA RA MDZOD, ,SA MA YA, ,RGYA, RGYA, RGYA, BKRA SHIS, ,)
